author: ccadminteam
title: Catalyst Circle - Funding Mechanism
description: Funding from Project Catalyst requires several months before funds are available. Critical initiatives need faster funding.
solution: Provide the elected Catalyst Circle with a pool of funds for community-driven, solution-based implementations for community-stated problems.
experience: Catalyst Circle Members serve a pivotal role in turning Catalyst into the largest decentralized innovation fund in the world.
